title: Celebrating whole language
creator_credit: Marilyn Woolley, Keith Pigdon, Steve Macdonald, Dennis Claringbold and Melbourne College of Advanced Education. Media Production Centre
brief_description: Professors Ken and Yetta Goodman are interviewed by Howard Mould, Pat Long and Marilyn Woolley about the “Whole Language Approach” to language learning. The interviews are intercut with scenes of the Goodmans in classrooms in Victoria which illustrate their child-centred approach. A useful resource for parent-teacher evenings, professional development, curriculum days and ELIC courses.
